de.uzk.hki.da.grid

Class IrodsSystemConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uzk.hki.da.grid.IrodsSystemConnector

  • public class IrodsSystemConnector
extends Object
    The IrodsSystemConnector. Centralized Access Class to functions of the iRODS DataGrid. Connects to an existing iRODS Data Server in Client mode and provides set of methods needed to work with an iRODS Server. Most of the methods being provided here could be used by having just a clean installation of iRODS Server.
    Author:
    Jens Peters
